txt.en: The Abyss of Mordath: The Power of the Dwarf-rings

Desperate to reclaim Manthríf, King Váskmun Greytooth has led the Firehorns into the Abyss of Mordath, but where has the elusive Dwarf-ring come to rest?\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>This deed can only be completed on Tier 2 of the Abyss of Mordath raid.</rgb>
Complete 'Challenge: The Power of the Dwarf-rings'
